phrases: Well then, any suggestions for the cultural festival next month?
What are the guys going to do, then?!
The boys can work behind the scenes!
Do not give me that crap!
I agree with the maid cafe idea!
I think everyone in the class should dress up!
I really want to see that!
Come on, it will be fun!
Ideas for the cultural festival Cafe?
the class decided on a cosplay cafe as a compromise!
The Clear and Blue Autumn Sky, and Passionate Otome
I am definitely not excited about it.
It is annoying that we all have to do it.
So you are up for it?
I have got the perfect idea idea for your costume.
Just leave the design and everything to me!
Does that mean you intend to make them?
Our club has an exhibit, too.
I will take care of everything the at history club, too!
Shinomiya-kun, what is your class going to be doing?
A pretty boy dressed as a girl!
I know you can pull this off.
You can be the best princess ever!
Allow me to be in charge of your production!
I will be sure to make you shine!
B-But, Senpai, you are already so busy with your class and club,
One more costume is no problem!
I cannot believe I am in charge of making costumes for them!
This is the chance of a lifetime!
Looks like I am going to be busy!
Shoulder width Chest circumference Arm circumference Inseam
Shoulder width Chest circumference Arm circumference Inseam
You are going to play the princess?
Okay, okay, that is enough, all of you.
I kind of let it slip.
But I just cannot help feeling that
you are going to be the cutest princess!
I am a man, too, you know.
If only I could say that...
You look very delicate, but you really are a man, huh?
Your shoulders are broad, and your hands are big, too.
He is got a thick neck, too!
I said you have a manly neck.
She is not done with me yet!
Maybe you bit off more than you can chew.
Yeah... but I am in charge of this.
I am free, so let me help.
You can count on me, too, ya know?
I came by to help out!
Do not skip out on your own class.
My class is already finished for the day!
Sorry, but can you come help out at the history club now?
Th-That is right, I totally forgot!
Sorry to ask when you are so busy,
we do not have enough hands.
I will go in your place, then.
Come to think about it, sewing does not suit us, anyway!
Sorry, but I would be really grateful!
Whoa, your writing is so messy!
You do not get to talk when you get kanji wrong
even when you are copying them!
It is for Serinuma-san, but she is not even here.
Well, it is not so bad.
And so, preparations moved along steadily.
And with a lot of commotion.
How about we try them on?
I think they are changing right now.
Those three look better than I ever imagined!
Whatever way I look at you, you are Shion!
You are incredibly cute, just as I expected!
No one would even think you are a boy!
She does not even see you as a man.
And she does not even see you as a real person.
I am so happy that you are all wearing the costumes I made.
I am glad you managed to finish.
You have to come see the cosplay cafe.
I am going to go see your play, too, Shinomiya-kun.
I will make sure you are not allowed in.
If we have time, let us go around the festival together!
But, it is a one-time thing, and if we all make the time...
I am not interested in playing buddy-buddy with everyone anymore.
so I would like to see the festival with just you, alone.
Why do I have to do anything with you?
I do not like it, either!
I do not want to play buddy-buddy with everyone, either!
I mean, why does it have to be like this anyway?
I just want to enjoy the festival!
What if we make a schedule so we all get equal time alone with her?
In short, we decide a time for everyone,
and in that slot, we each get alone time with her.
And during that time, the others cannot interfere.
Okay, we will go with that!
It is about time to change shifts.
Four dates lined up with four hotties, huh?
I really do not know how to handle being alone with a guy!
It is not like you will be completely alone with any of them.
Just have fun the way you always do!
I guess I should probably change first.
Let us go with you as Shion!
You two, advertise the cafe for us!
They are nowhere close to being alone together.
I guess that is a relief.
Damn, our time's going to end before we know it.
PC Club's Special Event Purikura Corner
To think I would get to have a picture with Shion...
I am a real, live man.
But your time's up, and we promised.
You could give me just a little
Let go of me, you bastard!
Are you up to eating yakisoba?
H-Have not we got the maid-master roles mixed up?
And wait, these are Mutsumi-senpai's chopsticks!
You are pretty smooth, are not you?
Class 1-D's theatrical program will begin shortly.
I ran because we were short on time.
Rather, I am grateful to you.
I am glad you are here to watch Shinomiya-kun's play with me.
I came here today to pick flowers.
N-No, that is not quite it...
M-My memory is totally blacked out.
The girls in my class said this was pretty scary.
I have got to show her my manly side.
You really did not pull anything funny during the play?
I never should have left you two alone in the dark like that!
He is not the sort to pull something.
Maybe he is no good with spooky things.
She does not even see you as a man.
Please, do not treat me like a child.
I am a man, you know.
Nanashima and the others should be coming back soon.
I wonder if things went well with Kae-chan.
It is like an otome game!
You are laughing too much, A-chan!
I was a fool to think I could take it easy.
It was not easy at all!
There was not anything usual about it!
It was way too much for me to handle!
This is the best place for me!
And yet, here I am, thrust into the center of some otome game-like story!
It was so much fun working with everyone to prepare for the festival.
Can we really not stay like that?
The guys want to make progress in their relationship with you.
I will go buy you something.
Do not worry about coming back, just chill out here.
Maybe it was a bad idea to leave them all behind.
But, going back is hard, too.
I was just looking at this flyer and thinking about going.
Come on, do not be like that.
Wh-What the hell are you doing?!
H-How did things end up like this?
I am going to kill you!
What is all the ruckus about?
Why did things turn out this way?
I do not want this at all.
Real life is just... is just...
History Club Exhibit Edo Castle Land
I am so sorry about what happened in the haunted house.
It really was an accident, though!
So I just bolted out of there...
But, being cornered against the wall.
Cannot let'them out of sight for a second!
I-I just do not have enough of an immunity for these real life events!
And then there was that big mess.
I am just beyond my limits!
I may have rushed things a little too much.
I do not want to upset you.
How about we take it slow?
I guess that is all there is to it.
At least there is never a dull moment with this bunch.
I do not have any objections.
Now for the cultural festival's finale!
please partner up and gather in the center!
Let us not have anymore of this today.
Are you really one to talk?
It would be a waste not to.
This really is the best place we can be.
This is my way of life!
Kae-chan, do you know a good place to have cake?
I thought it would be nice to have cake with Mi-kun for Christmas.
I always go to events on Christmas so I do not really know.
Last year, there was a Noel with Shion event!
By Shion, you mean that cut-out thing?
I have a picture of us together.
Next time: Christmas in the Holy Land
So it really was a cut-out.
A Christmas party devoted to Shion!
